paper_metadata.title: MAIN TEXT
paper_metadata.extraction_summary: Extracted information on a single BRCA2 variant, including penetrance data and individual records.

individual_records.evidence_sentence: In addition to these cases, MLPA detected apparent single-exon deletions in two breast cancer patients who were subsequently shown to have microdeletions within the MLPA probe recognition sequences: 364delT in BRCA1 exon 6 and 983delACAG in BRCA2 exon 9.

functional_data.summary: The deletion was confirmed to be a microdeletion affecting probe recognition.

variants.additional_notes: The deletion was confirmed in another laboratory.
key_quotes: MLPA detected apparent single-exon deletions in two breast cancer patients who were subsequently shown to have microdeletions within the MLPA probe recognition sequences: 364delT in BRCA1 exon 6 and 983delACAG in BRCA2 exon 9.

extraction_metadata.notes: Only one BRCA2 variant was reported in the paper.
